column4: Hello, I'd like to know how to check if ubuntu recognizes my GPU and uses the radeon drivers
(since X configures everything all by itself, xorg.conf won't help)
Hello, I'd like to know how to check if ubuntu recognizes my GPU and uses the radeon drivers. OS: Ultimate edition (ubuntu gutsy)
ultimate edition isn't suported here.. but you can do less /var/log/Xorg.0.log to see if it loads radeon drivers
